nodes.documentation:
@title Owned contract 
assigns an owner of the contract at the time of deployment.
nodes.name: Owned

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You are not the owner of the contract"

arguments.value: You are not the owner of the contract

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You are not the owner of the contract"

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to verify that the sender is owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev Change the owner of the contract.
nodes.name: changeOwner

nodes.documentation: @title The Mortal contract extends the Owner contract.
nodes.name: Mortal

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You are not the owner of the contract"

arguments.value: You are not the owner of the contract

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You are not the owner of the contract"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Destroy the contract.
Any remaining balance in the smart contract is transferred to the owner account.
nodes.name: kill
